oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certificate of discharge for William Waldrup
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certificate of discharge for Cpl. William Waldrup, Co. F (David Dickinson's), 6th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Waldrup, a native of Hardin County, enrolled on September 21, 1862. He was discharged from service on July 26, 1865 at Pulaski, Tenn., by Special Order 12 C. S. Mil. Div. Tenn. Waldrup is buried at the Mt. Zion Cemetery, Hardin County, Tenn. (six miles north of Pickwick Dam).
